\documentclass{standalone}
\usepackage{tikz-cd}
\usepackage{amssymb}
\input{../macros/letters}
\begin{document}
    \begin{tikzcd}
        \mcc
        \arrow{r}{F_\mcd}
        \arrow[swap]{d}{F_\mce}
        &
        \mcd
        \arrow{d}{G_\mcd}
        \\
        \mce
        \arrow[swap]{r}{G_\mce}
        &
        \mcb
        \arrow[pos=0.125, draw=none]{ul}[description]{\hspace{0.5em}\rotatebox{90}{\scalebox{1.5}{\(\urcorner\)}}}
    \end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
